entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 4.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
